com.esri.svr.ejb
Class ServiceCatalogBean

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.svr.cat.BaseCatalog
        |
        +--com.esri.svr.ejb.ServiceCatalogBean
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.ejb.EnterpriseBean, javax.ejb.EntityBean, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ServiceCatalogBeanBMP
public abstract class ServiceCatalogBean
extends BaseCatalog
implements javax.ejb.EntityBean

This class provides partial implementations of ServiceCatalogLocal and ServiceCatalogLocalHome interfaces in addition to the EntityBean interface. This abstract class could be used as CMP bean.

See Also:
Serialized Form
